- Victoria Park (Row 2): 36,729
- VFL Park (Row 6): 21,561
- MCG (Row 5): 17,951
- Windy Hill (Row 1): 19,229
- Lake Oval (Row 4): 12,176
- Princes Park (Row 3): 13,400

So the highest crowd is at Victoria Park with 36,729 attendees. Comparing this to all other venues, none have a higher number. Therefore, the claim that Victoria Park drew the largest crowd of any game in the table is true.

I should make sure I'm considering only the relevant cells for verification. The claim specifically mentions the crowd size at Victoria Park, so I need to include its row index and column name in the relevant_cells list.

To verify the claim, we compare the crowd sizes at each venue. Victoria Park has the highest attendance of 36,729, making the claim true.
